I've been thinking a little more about that art show idea you had.$3#$b#Not like I had much of a choice, Abigail has been pestering me about it non-stop, as she said she would.#$b#*Smile* I really like that pushy side of her.#$b#Truth be told, she didn't need to convince me, I know it's a really good idea...#$b#So, I'm going to do it...
